entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:07 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 10:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
